an5.63:1: "Bhikkhus, growing in five ways, a male noble disciple grows by a noble growth, and he absorbs the essence and the best of this life. What five? He grows in faith, virtuous behavior, learning, generosity, and wisdom. Growing in these five ways, a male noble disciple grows by a noble growth, and he absorbs the essence and the best of this life."
an5.63:2: He who grows in faith and virtuous behavior,in wisdom, generosity, and learningâ€”such a discerning superior manabsorbs for himself the essence of this life.
